profile:
Thanks for visiting us at HomeStars. At Premiere Custom Millwork & Fireplaces Ltd, our philosophy is simple; to be the best we can be in servicing your needs. We believe that our customers come first; it is not just a cliché but a commitment we make to all our past and future customers. 

To be successful in business, it takes a winning combination of services, competitive pricing and dedication by all employees to excel at customer service excellence. Our continued growth is testament to our pledge to provide you with products of the highest quality and unmatched customer service; we have built our reputation on this belief. 

We encourage you to look around our site and see what we have to offer. If you don’t see what you are looking for, call us at 905-671-3473 and we will be happy to discuss your needs.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
AM Group Heating & Cooling Ltd. takes a great pride in offering one of the largest showrooms displaying wood and gas burning fireplaces as well as heating and cooling products for your commercial and residential needs. Over the years we have been helping our clients to choose the right heating and cooling products to fit their needs and lifestyle.
 From our knowledgeable and friendly in-house consultants to our licensed, professional installation team, AM Group strives to make the transition from vision to reality as smooth as possible, whether you’re looking for traditional or contemporary wood and gas burning fireplace or the most advanced heating and cooling systems for your home. We welcome homeowners, designers, architects and builders to visit our showroom and meet with a member of our staff to discuss their plans.

Some services that we offer, heating, humidifiers, BBQ, air quality, fireplaces, air conditioning, Sale, service and installation of gas,free stand gas stove and electric fireplace, A/C, furnace , heat pump, water heater , etc.

profile:
A Message from the President
Hello I’m Steven Desjardins, President of Oliver Heating & Cooling.

I Know that there are a lot of choices out there for your heating and cooling needs and I would like to personally thank you for visiting our Website and considering us as a potential provider for your family’s home comfort.

Oliver Heating & Cooling was founded right here in Aurora in 1924 by Thomas Howard Oliver, that’s some 95 summers and 95 winters ago… Over the years we have recognized the changing needs of our customers especially when it comes to your home comfort.

We have partnered with the most technologically advanced Manufacturer’s who provide the highest efficiency furnaces and air conditioning products and brought them to York Region. with the rising cost of energy, finding the right products at the best prices has never been more important.

We are extremely proud to be serving our community. From all of my staff to you, we greatly appreciate the opportunity to serve you and we won’t let you down.

TH would be proud.
sincerely
Steven Desjardins
President
